Package application

Class SampleController

java.lang.Object
application.SampleController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class SampleController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The Sample controller class controls the view portion of the programming, housing the JavaFX portion of the project.

  • Method Details

    • buyToy

      void buyToy(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Buy Toy action. The selected Toy is checked, if its count is greater than 1 it will subtract the count by one.
      Parameters:
      event - Buy button click,
      Throws:
      IOException

    • clearToys

      void clearToys(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Clears search preferences.
      Parameters:
      event - Clear button being pressed

    • searchToys

      void searchToys(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Search toys. Updates list view with toys relevant to search.
      Parameters:
      event - Search button being pressed

    • addToy

      void addToy(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Adds toy to store.
      Parameters:
      event - Add toy button being clicked. Adds toy based on type selected and information entered.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • basicAddValidator

      public static boolean basicAddValidator(String SN, String Name, String Brand, double Price, int Count, int Age, String PriceString, String CountString, String AgeString) throws exceptions.InvalidSinLength, exceptions.NegativeInputException, exceptions.MissingInput
      Checks basic information entered into add toy for valid inputs
      Parameters:
      SN - Serial number of toy being added
      Name - Name of toy being added
      Brand - Brand of toy being added
      Price - Price of toy being added
      Count - How much availability of toy being added
      Age - Range for toy being added
      Throws:
      exceptions.MissingInput
      exceptions.InvalidSinLength
      exceptions.NegativeInputException

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • removeToy

      void removeToy(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Removes toy from inventory
      Parameters:
      event - Remove toy button being pressed. When pressed the toy with the matching SN entered is removed.
